rules_text:
Wesgoth Cemetery enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}. If there are thirteen or more corpse counters on Wesgoth Cemetery, remove those counters, transform it, then untap it.
Whenever a nontoken creature dies, put a corpse counter on Wesgoth Cemetery.
Wesgoth Cemetery can be your commander.
rules_text2:
Trample, haste
Skullbriar, Death's Mockery remains transformed as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.
Skullbriar gets +1/+1 for each creature card in all graveyards.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
